nodes.text: A model of training droid that was visually similar to the DT-series sentry droids used by the Galactic Empire during 2 BBY was utilized in the time after the formation of the Galactic Empire. The droids were used on the planet Kamino at a Tipoca City Training Facility that was used to test the clones. At the facility, the droids were used by Tarkin to test Clone Force 99 in a combat proficiency test that turned into a live-fire exercise.
